hero.title: I'm Luke, an analytical thinker in the Netherlands
hero.tagline: Finance professional turned curious learner, documenting my journey through data, experiments, and the occasional Dutch language mishap.

paragraphs: I'm a finance professional living in the Netherlands, where I've spent the last six years trying to master Dutch (spoiler: still working on it). What started as a career in FP&A has evolved into a fascinating journey of analytical thinking and continuous learning.

My approach to problems is deeply rooted in my CliftonStrengths - Harmony, Context, and Analytical thinking. I believe in understanding the "why" behind everything, whether it's Federal Reserve policy decisions, supplement effectiveness, or why my Dutch pronunciation still makes locals chuckle.

Currently, I'm preparing for an Associate Product Manager transition, which has led me to explore business frameworks, case study methodologies, and product thinking. This learning lab is where I document those discoveries, test hypotheses, and share what actually works.

When I'm not diving into financial models or experimenting with new productivity methods, you'll find me attempting to have conversations in Dutch with varying degrees of success, or analyzing whether that new supplement actually improved my energy levels (spoiler: data is everything).

timeline.title: Finally Masters Dutch
timeline.description: After 11 years of practice, Luke achieves native-level fluency and celebrates by ordering coffee without getting confused looks from the barista

timeline.title: APM Journey Begins
timeline.description: Started intensive preparation for Associate Product Manager roles, diving deep into business cases and product frameworks

timeline.title: Learning Lab Launch
timeline.description: Created lukethinks.nl as a space to document experiments, analyses, and learning discoveries

timeline.title: Married My Best Friend
timeline.description: Got married to my wonderful Dutch partner - finally making my Netherlands residency official in the best way possible

timeline.title: Senior FP&A Analyst
timeline.description: Promoted to senior role, leading financial modeling and analysis for strategic initiatives

timeline.title: Bought First Home
timeline.description: Navigated the Dutch housing market (somehow) and became a homeowner in Nijmegen

timeline.title: Discovered CliftonStrengths
timeline.description: Completed the assessment and finally understood why I analyze everything - it's literally my top strength

timeline.title: FP&A Analyst
timeline.description: Built expertise in financial planning, budgeting, and variance analysis while mastering Excel wizardry

timeline.title: Netherlands Adventure Begins
timeline.description: Moved to the Netherlands for love and career opportunities - began the ongoing quest to speak Dutch fluently

timeline.title: Finance Career Transition
timeline.description: Pivoted from previous career into finance, drawn by the analytical challenges and data-driven decision making

facts.text: 6 years in Netherlands, Dutch still a work in progress
Finance & FP&A professional with analytical mindset
Preparing for Associate Product Manager transition
Married in 2023 to my Dutch partner
